name: Pellet Packer: Cookie Crunch
description:
Platforming with a mouse has never been so fun!

Chomper and Chaser are back like you've never seen them before! This time, they explore delicious new worlds in Pellet Packer: Cookie Crunch! Play through all-new platforming levels that cleverly remix the same movement mechanics and controls from the original Pellet Packer: Micro Munch! Use the cookies scattered around the stage to traverse, show off your quick wits and reflexes to pass tricky obstacles, explore the stage to find all 6 Chaser defences in each one and advance to the next level-- but watch out!! Every 5 levels, there's a boss battle- utilizing the same physics as the original Pellet Packer: Micro Munch!! Can you complete this crunchy quest?

With a substantial main quest and a large amount of post-game content, this extremely replayable game feels like biting into a warm, freshly baked cookie- and once you get a taste of this treat, you'll be eating it up for a while!!

Originally released February 1st, 2022
Special thanks to SheepTester for code/exporting help
